caption: The tour of Montmarte in Pierre‚Äôs Citroen was the highlight of my recent trip to Paris. I absolutely loved every second of this 60 minute tour. Pierre‚Äôs is an excellent guide, driver and photographer!!! He speaks great English and provides live commentary during the tour. Oh and he plays French music which makes the drive very enjoyable. He stops and takes videos and photos at all the great spots. He is very down to earth and very knowledgeable. I highly recommend this tour to anyone visiting Paris. I am looking forward to doing another tour of Paris in Pierre‚Äôs Citroen. Once again, thanks to Pierre for giving me an amazing experience on my holiday !!!! You‚Äôre simply the best.

I wanted to experience Paris differently on this trip and I'm so glad I booked this tour with Pierre. He was delightful and I could tell he enjoyed showing off Paris. He knows the city well, the history and pop culture anecdotes too. Communication before the tour was easy and on point so there was no confusion. I wasn't staying in Paris but meeting/pickup was no problem. He took great photos and videos of me throughout the tour as well! Pierre's enthusiasm adds to the enjoyment of the tour. It's great that he likes to throw in some surprises too. His Citroen is a character too -- loved all the looks and smiles as we drove around. The tour was tailored to me and that is a very important touch. Driving through the winding streets of Montmartre was wonderful! His soundtrack for the tour is so fitting too - if you love the magic of Paris, it is enhanced by his music playlist. I chose a time when the sun would set while we were driving, the city of lights came to life!

One of my favorite ways to see Paris!!! I live in the city but love taking my guests on there excursions. Pierre was fantastic (his driving skills unmatched!!!) and so much fun. Loved hearing all the stories he shared. The route was perfect, driving super professional and the atmosphere just fabulous. Will be back. Highly recommend!
Pierre is an amazing tour guide! I can‚Äôt recommend this tour enough. You get to see so many cool sites around Paris from the cutest little convertible that turns heads the whole time.

Absolutely best experience in Paris! Had an amazing time during our 1 hour tour. The car was impeccable and charming as was our driver who was also well informed about the city, driving safe and keeping us entertained and not to forget a photographer par excellence! Highly recommend taking a tour!

Bottomline: BOOK THIS TOUR!!!! I visited Paris with my sister during the summer Olympics and booked Pierre's So French 4 hour tour of Paris in his orange Citro√´n. Not only did he come pick us up from our AirBnB, but he also took some awesome pictures of us! He will take you all over the most picturesque parts of Paris (and even some hidden gems), including driving right along the bank of the Seine! (It's awesome!!) If you're on a time crunch and want to see Paris' greatest hits, Pierre will take you to all of them and even customize the tour for you (for example, we stopped at a bakery!) Next time we are in Paris, we will 100% do another So French Tour! Thank you so much, Pierre!!!!
Pierre was SO amazing. We loved our tour so much and had a lovely time. He has some great recommendations so better to do the tour at the beginning of the trip. Learned so much ‚ù§Ô∏è

This has been one of my favorite travel experiences. Pierre was so knowledgeable, fun, accommodating, and a great driver. We got to see every single thing we wanted to see and more! I would recommend this tour to friends and family visiting. It was truly a pleasure and the highlight of our trip.

If you are in Paris, this tour is a must! My wife, me and my little daughters enjoyed it so much and asked to add extra time to our tour. Pierre is a great tour guide, very knowledgeable and an excellent photographer. Although what he does is exhausting, he is very passionate about what he does and will never let you down. The car was clean and well maintained. The music choices were perfect. Everything beyond our expectations.

Pierre made our day so memorable, so beautifull and soooo french! We took our little daughers( 5years and 7 years) in this superbe tour! He is not just someone who drive you to the spots of Paris...he is such a nice french guy, he took us on all the beautifull streets, he was our photographe also( and a good one in my opinion). It is so unique the feeling you have in this blue little car! And we asked hom for the best fondue and he did all his best to make us happy! Thank you so much Pierre, spending time with you was a pleasure for us and our girls! See you next timeüòâ

There is no other way to start off your Paris trip without So French tour! Our driver knew all the streets of Paris, was able to show and tell all the stories and history throughout the drive! He had an amazing music playlist, made us fall into every corners of Paris even more. Would definitely do this again!! Its truely unique and awesome experience!!

So French Tour was absolutely the highlight of our trip to Paris. We loved it so much, we booked it again for the following night! The tour guides are so knowledgeable and friendly. They are willing to go out of their way to make sure you have the best experience possible. Thank you So French Tour & Pierre for making our trip so memorable!

Pierre made our weekend girls trip in Paris. His tour was super fun, he tells you a lot of interesting facts ranging from history to pop culture, and you get amazing pictures to remember the experience and the greatest landmarks of the city. Visiting over 60 countries and doing many tours, this would be one of my top recommendations. Merci Pierre! :D

We had the absolute best time on our tour. Our driver was so much fun, very knowledgeable and a careful driver. He took so many brilliant photos of me and my friends. If you visit Paris, don't leave without booking a tour in this cute iconic car!

So French tours was more amazing that I expected it to be. Pierre was amazing. He was very knowledgeable of Paris. I had told him I wanted to see the twinkling at 11 PM of the Eiffel Tower. We arrived there seconds before 11 PM and was straight dead center in the middle. he took us to see all the major areas knew a lot about the history, took us to see where the fight scene was for John Wick three. We saw so many important landmarks was given so many different tips and felt like we got more than we paid for . I would definitely use here again and I will recommend him to my friends and family.

Pierre was an amazing guide. He was very kind and helpful. He knows the city inside and out, gave us many great recommendations and will take all the pictures you'd like. He truly cares that you have a great experience. Support him and his business it is an honest one and a fantastic one!

This was by far the coolest adventure in Paris! Pierre created a curated experience by showing us spectacular sights, sharing interesting facts at the backdrop of beautiful music. An amazing day we‚Äôll never forget!
Pierre! Is an amazing tour guide, camera man, driver and companion to show you around Paris! Enjoyed every minute of the chilly night tour with a blanket and great music.

Nothing better than make a tour through the historical and classic city of Paris in a classic car, we did this tour in a 2CV (Citro√´n) a classic car made in France passing by some points of interest, this tour has different routes so you will have to decide for the one that interests you most. I'm a bit picky about the photos and Pierre who is the guide and owner of the car took care of making a nice tour and taking good photos for us. Thanks a lot!
Pierre is a star, most fun we've had anywhere on a tour, and he's a great photographer too! Highly recommended.

Pierre‚Äôs tour was absolutely amazing. Beyond accomodating, knowledgable, and fun! If you are in paris even for a few hours, book this tour immediately. It should be the first thing you do. Worth every dime!

This is an excellent tour if you're tired of walking the streets of Paris and want to sit down and enjoy not only the classic landmarks but also many hidden gems that will be revealed to you. Pierre is a highly skilled driver and will take you to places you couldn't imagine being able to reach with a car. He maneuvers through extremely narrow streets and uncovers the hidden gems of Paris. Throughout the tour, Pierre plays great French music, perfectly timed to coincide with the locations we're visiting. He's a very professional and entertaining guide. This is an experience I can wholeheartedly recommend to my friends.
Pierre is an amazing driver and host.  The perfect Paris tour, with so much history and laughs. Amazing.

Pierre is knowledgeable, punctual, friendly and he went above and beyond the to ensure that our experience was special and we were able to see all the monuments. The car is very cute and we felt like local celebrities when pedestrians stopped to take pictures of it. Pierre is also a fantastic photographer, and very accommodating all round. This is a 10/10 experience, I highly recommend it. You will not be disappointed.

The SoFrenchTour was the highlight of our 2 week London-Paris-Amsterdam holiday.  Pierre was extremely accommodating and willing to take photos.  We lucked out with sunny skies and a warm day in February.  We opted to take this trip on our first day in Paris and Pierre showed so many great "secret" places we went back - Montmartre is a definite must on this trip!  The car was the coolest experience as it really can squeeze in everywhere.  Worth every Euro and definitely ask for the classy french music.

Highly recommend this driving tour with Pierre! He is very knowledgeable about Paris and her history. He is passionate about this tour and it really shows throughout the experience. It is also a great way to see so many different sights in Paris that are difficult to get to on your own. Don‚Äôt miss this opportunity :)

Pierre was the best - a driver, tour guide, dj (may need that playlist), and photographer extraordinaire! Highly recommend for a first night in Paris to see all the sights in style. He was laid back, chill, and flexible to whatever vibe you wanted. Cute car too zipping through all the small streets. Very easy to book, book on his website and then sort the pick-up details on WhatsApp. Such a fun experience!

This is THE BEST Tour in Paris! Pierre is very enthusiastic, cheerful & hell bent on giving the true Paris Experience!  He goes the extra mile to ensure guests have a great time! And yes also clicks Million dollars photos! ü§òüèºü§òüèºü§òüèº

We scheduled our whole morning (and only morning) in Paris around this tour and the provider was a no-show, no-call!  Super unprofessional.  We called, texted, had Viator do the same and they reached out an hour after the tour was scheduled to be over to say they forgot the time!  Wow!  Thanks for ruining our day in Paris.  Please do yourself a favor and use someone who operates on a schedule.  I‚Äôd add a picture, but the only one I have is of my family staying on the street for 45 minutes waiting on someone who never showed!

Awesome experience! Pierre is so charismatic and can tell you the coolest stories about Paris. He also takes amazing pictures on the go which are definitely instagram worthy. Definitely a must for first time visitors in Paris!

Just an amazing tour. We were picked up from the Eiffel Tower and had a great drive. He is not only an amazing driver who knows the streets of Paris but he is also a great photographer.  We wouldn‚Äôt want to miss this experience. Greatest thing to do in Paris!
The BEST tour of Paris. Pierre was fantastic!  Best knowledge of the city, fun facts and amazing recommendations for places to visit. I cannot recommend this enough!  Worth every penny!

Pierre was a gracious and knowledgeable guide. If you only have a few days in Paris this is wonderful and fun way to get oriented. Pierre went above and beyond to try to take us directly to our hotel, prevented by circumstances beyond his control and later sent us restaurant recommendations for our stay. 5 stars!

Great fun and a packed 2h of sights in Paris. Wife had hurt her knee skiing so walking around for hours was not possible. Pierre speaks excellent english and is super flexible. We got to see places we would not know about during our short trip to this beautiful city. And going on a tour in anything else than a top down 2CV is just wrong!

We had our ride with Pieere , he is so nice, co-operative and informative. My 3 Y kid liked the ride alot it was so fund and the musice selection was perfect,  Pieere was so kind with my kid which help me enjoy the ride even more. I totally recommend 1:30 hours tour
Best experience!! My husband and I went on a tour with Pierre and it was the most perfect ending to our trip in Paris! Highly recommend!
Pier has the best personality and so knowledgeable about the city. The vibes were immaculate. You HAVE to do this trip in Paris!!
We had a memorable tour from Sacr√©-C≈ìur to the Eiffel Tower. Great ambience and crazy traffic accompanied by a soundtrack of french classics. Give it a shot!
